name: Ubuntu Echelon Edition V2.0
short_description: So many distros come out promising they support the anonymous ideals, meanwhile they rape you for all your personal info. We were never interested in this and went off on our own tangent. Initially built to crack local wifis, it went on to aid Anonymous Ops online and is now revived for a 2nd version. Built off Backtrack Rc3, uses parts of Lubuntu and Anti X Debian with Ubuntu bonuses like the software Center prebuilt into it. Masked by Tor out of the box with a modified Firefox built specifically for helping Anon Ops needing that special kick in the butt.
summary: An Ubuntu Distro built specifically with quick options built for Ops
